Name: Smash Crates
About the game: Smash Crates is a local/online fighting game of pure chaos. BUILD, DESTROY and MANIPULATE the battlefield to your advantage. Fight for glory with up to 4 friends as the Crates of myth and legend. Be there and be square! Key Features 2 to 4 player battles locally or online using Remote Play. No Single Player. 3 Game modes: Battle Mode, Survival Mode and Zone Control Character Customisation 20 Completely destructible maps layouts Terrain manipulating power ups Great soundtrack BATTLE WITH FRIENDS Battle with up to 4 friends. CHARACTER CUSTOMISATION Show off your style with your hat selection. DESTROY EVERYTHING Destroy the terrain to sculpt the battle field to your advantage. BUILD TO SURVIVE As the battlefield shrinks build and defend your territory. Creators: Game Designer: Julian Beiboer Pixel Artists: Jessica Lyon Animator: Jackie Cai Music Composer: Mikey O'Neil
